CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(X2014_Probability__c ,"Cultivate: Educate 10%"), 0.1 * X2014_Ask_Amount__c, IF(ISPICKVAL( X2014_Probability__c ,"Cultivate: Engage 30%"), 0.3* X2014_Ask_Amount__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( X2014_Probability__c ,"Solicit: Ask 60%"), 0.6 * X2014_Ask_Amount__c ,0)))
CustomField.label: 2014 Projected Amount
